panels.dialogue: Pocky: "We should split up! Cover more ground!" Prismor: "Agreed. Malrik and I will check the observatory. The celestial lenses are key."

panels.dialogue: Lunara: "I'll return to the garden with Marivielle. Check the Nature Essence directly." Val: "And I'll question the couriers. Someone must have seen something."
